[i]Black Dragon Prince[/i] – Whenever another creature you control transforms or becomes promoted, create two tapped Treasure tokens.
[i]Captured and Turned[/i] – Whenever Rajaion, Heir to Goldoa becomes the target of a spell or ability, you may sacrifice two permanents or discard two cards. If you do, counter that spell or ability and transform Rajaion.
